statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE property_id = 10;
SELECT maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_history GROUP BY technician_name;
SELECT MAX(cost) AS max_cost FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT maintenance_type, technician_name FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY technician_name
SELECT property_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%' AND cost < 500 ORDER BY property_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT property_id FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-06-01' AND technician_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY property_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Plumbing'
SELECT * FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE property_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT * FROM RepairHistory WHERE repair_type = 'Plumbing';
SELECT property_id, repair_date, repair_type FROM RepairHistory ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE property_id = 100;
SELECT property_id, maintenance_date FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT property_id) AS total_properties FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE 'Plumbing%';
SELECT repair_id, repair_date, repair_type FROM RepairHistory WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM Property WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT repair_id, repair_date, repair_cost FROM RepairHistory WHERE property_id = 3 ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, MAX(repair_cost) AS max_repair_cost FROM RepairHistory GROUP BY property_id;
SELECT property_id, repair_history FROM Property WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM Property;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Plumbing';
SELECT repair_description, repair_cost FROM RepairHistory WHERE repair_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM RepairHistory ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_address, last_maintenance_date FROM Property WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_id, address, type FROM Property WHERE year_built > 2000;
SELECT property_id, address, type, year_built FROM Property ORDER BY year_built DESC;
SELECT property_id, address, type FROM Property WHERE owner_id IS NULL;
SELECT p.property_id, p.address, o.name AS owner FROM Property p LEFT JOIN Owner o ON p.owner_id = o.owner_id;
SELECT property_id, address, type FROM Property WHERE year_built > 2000;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT Property.*, RepairHistory.description AS repair_desc FROM Property JOIN RepairHistory ON Property.property_id = RepairHistory.property_id;
SELECT Owner.name, Property.address, RepairHistory.cost FROM Owner, Property, RepairHistory WHERE Owner.owner_id = Property.owner_id AND Property.property_id = RepairHistory.property_id;
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM Property;
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_name, city, state FROM Property WHERE state='CA';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, contact_number FROM PropertyOwner ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT property_id, task_description, scheduled_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_name, address, city FROM Property ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT property_name, state, zip_code FROM Property WHERE state='California';
SELECT owner_name, email FROM PropertyOwner INNER JOIN Property ON PropertyOwner.property_id = Property.property_id;
SELECT repair_id, issue_description, cost FROM RepairHistory WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
